attr.title: Shovel Knight - Standalones
attr.desc: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove loader.  You must have a copy of one or more of the stand-alone Shovel Knight for Linux copied to the ports/shovelknight-standalone/gamedata folder for the appropriate game.  For more info on the setup needs, see https://github.com/christianhaitian/arkos/wiki/ArkOS-Emulators-and-Ports-information
